body.p:
Scottville Ky March 11/63
Gov. Robinson
Frankfort Ky

Dr Sir you will remember that some time in January last I with others presented you a petition requesting your clemency in his behalf ^of James Loyd^ You will also remember that you suggested that I had better get a statement of his case from some other Citizens of this county, who know the case.. and the circumstances attending it.. I send a number of names of Respectable men in this county also the separate statement of Doct Walker which together with the paper I handed you I hope will Satisfy your mind that Loyd is a proper subject for your Clemency.
Pettn for Pardon of James Loyd
